reviews.review:
No puedo creer que en toda mi vida no haya jugado esta obra maestra sino hasta ahora, aunque su único problema es que es muuuuy corto, en un momento se pasa :S

Aunque al menos tiene los desafios contrarreloj y los otros, que dan para un poco mas de tiempo de juego. 

De igual manera, siempre lo recomendaré.
Its like eating a cookie, you just have to love it!!

I enjoyed this game quite a bit. While it isn't long by any means, it isn't supposed to be. Rather, it's supposed to be a game that you can complete within a few hours. Here's a list of some of the things you will encounter/do in Portal within said hours:

- Think with portals 
- Cubes
- Incinerators
- Buttons
- Bigger Buttons
- Energy Pellets
- Judgemental yet humorous Artificial Intelligence
- Remove cameras from walls
- Energy Grids
- Utilize Newton's Law Of Momentum
- Testing
- Cake

Seriously though, if you are a fan of short yet fun puzzle games, get this one. You will not be disappointed.

9/10 

(Oh, and great music. Let's not forget that. :3)
this game is 9\10 its really fun but the sad thing is that its 2-3 hours long. but still fun
O que dizer desse jogo, muito bom, valeu a pena todo meu dinheiro gasto nele !
Not origin of portal puzzles, but difinitely awesome
This cake is great, it's so delicious and moist.
Absolutely recommend. A watershed in gaming. I remember picking this up with The Orange Box in 2008 and loving it, my favourite game of the 5. Everybody on Steam SHOULD own this game.
Great game. Exciting, puzzling, and just plain awesome!

While being a very short game, Portal is a fanstastic experience. If you can pick it up on sale, please do. Cleverly written, and with the developers notes giving you an extremely intresting insight into game designs, I'm very satisfied with the time I spent playing this game.
Genial, buenisimo. Me lo acabe del tirón.
One of the best puzzle games of all time and also manages to wedge a good story in too. Good job valve.

if you don't mind getting sassed by evil robots and not being able to sass back
then this is the game for you
polecam fajna gra :)
ez game finished in 3 hrs

Una Figata! COMPRATELO!
Uma merda, esse jogo é todo buago, do nada parou de funcionar no meu pc! dando hl2.exe paroud e funcionar, e eu já reinstalei umas tres vezes.
This game is awesome.A really good puzzle game where you need to use portals to complete testchambers.Also GET PORTAL 2!!!!...and all its dlc

Pokochałem te grę zanim jeszcze w nią zagrałem, widać tam troche błędów ale nie przeszkadza to w namiętnym rozwiązywaniu łamigłówek, jedynce co mi nie pasuje to dość "sztywna" GLaDOS w porównaniu do Portal2, no i oczywiście tylko 2 godziny gry w głównym wątku, SZCZERZE POLECAM.
Not bad for a puzzle game :)
Довольно интересная и захватывающая игра! Суровая проверка для вашего интеллекта! А песня из финальных титров очень замечательная! Всё-таки тортик я получил)

Uno stile nuovo ma spettacolare. Ammetto che non sono amante dei giochi rompicapo o comunque dove bisogna "mettere in moto il cervello", ma questo gioco mi ha fatto ricredere. Vedendo dei video gameplay non capivo molto gioco e lo trovavo noioso,ma dopo aver provato la demo e finito il gioco completo lo consiglio assolutamente, veramente bello! Potrà sembrare corto poichè i livelli sono solo 19 e i primi specialmente sono molto corti, ma verso gli ultimi diventano più complicati e bisogna ragionarci maggiormente. In particolare il 19 è molto lungo poichè è la fine del gioco, piena di effetti sorpresa. Lo consiglio vivamente
very  good
PERFECT GAME!

Defalarca bitirdiğim sayılı oyunlardan birisi sıkmadan akıcı ve çok eğlenceli bir şekilde devam eden bir oyun.Singplayerde diyaloglar çok hoş, eminim izlerken çok eğlenirsiniz.Özellikle arkadaşınız varsa birlikte Atölyedeki bölümleri oynamak gerçekten tadından yenmiyor arkadaşlar.Kesinlikle tavsiye ederim.

Игра просто The Best))) 
Советую пройти не пожелеете! 
Эта игра займет у вас от часу до двух, но она этого стоит.

fun gameplay, interesting story, great humor. it is truly an experience not to miss. DO NOT expect loads of gameplay, the game can easily be finished in one session. im a fan of short games, but i wouldn't mind it being one or two hours longer.
Klasyk. Mimo, że krótkie trzeba zagrać i tyle. Nie ma co rozpisywać i czytać recenzje, po prostu to kup!

Hoestly, buy this game. It is a must.

One of the best games ive ever played!  When I thought it was over, it was just the beginning!

I'm normally an Assassins Creed II, Skyrim, or even COD type of guy. This isn't really my genre for gaming. However, I do like solving puzzles. I got this on a steam sale for $2.50, which is cheaper than 2 songs off itunes, so if it was a bust for me, I wouldn't lose much. Well, let's just say that I beat the game in one sitting. Yeah, that's how good it was. It i a short game, but this is a must-have for every gamer.
really nice game!
One of the best games I ever played. Couldn't spend money on better thing. :)
Great game a classic I never got around to playing untill now. About every other "TEST" I found my self laughing at the remark the AI's make, and the turrets are hillararious  as well.

It truly is one of the best games I have ever played. While it is short, it is unique and fun. The game has a lot of character, despite only having one speaking character during the game. I would have written a review on this game years and years ago, but I never actually owned my own copy of this game until last week. I have beaten the game about a dozen times since 2009 though.
Jogo curto, mas muito bom. História muito boa (considerando o 2 - já que o 1 é pouco esclarecido). 10/10
Brilliant! Better than the console versions.

Very good game.  I have always liked puzzle games and this is certainly a unique one.  The game is a little on the short side but not too short.  I will say there are quite a few bugs in the step challenges though.  Would buy again.
cok kaliteli bir oyun zeka çalıştırıyor

The thing that makes the first portal is the witty and intelligent humour mixed with the cleverly thought out puzzles. Another good thing is that its child friendly with its content and easily playable for a young user and its quite the same for an older gamer just starting. It's where to start for a valve game to get the grasp of their quality of amazing games. Its still smooth for lower end PC's and just as enjoyable too! I recommend it.

Great small game!
The history is awesome so far and I can't wait to start playing the second one.
Recomended

Ich habe mir das Portal Bundle gekauft und ich muss sagen das ich wirklich sehr viel spass bei diesem Spiel hatte. Es dauert nicht all zu lang und war nach 3 Stunden durch , jedoch hatte ich viele Momente wo ich was zu lachen hatte , denn dieses Spiel ist mit viel Humor versehen :D Echt cool !

Жаль, что игра довольно короткая, хотелось бы побольше.
Однако, это отличная проба для разработчиков, которые выпустят шедевральную вторую часть этой игры.
Некоторые комнаты показались даже труднее, чем последние уровни из второй части. Требуется реагировать очень быстро, чтобы пройти их.
Небольшая, но самодостаточная игра.
Fini en 2,3h en y jouant pour la première fois... et pourtant ? Génial. Le 2 est, en plus de ça, encore mieux !

Why are you reading this?  Have you not played this game already?  How is that possible?  This game has one of the coolest mechanics I've ever seen in a game.  It's challenging, the story is super engrossing, and the humor is top notch.

Portal is an amazing game, truly unique and special. That being said, the game is too expensive and too short, only buy this game if it is on sale or in the orange box or valve complete bundle.

9/10

The game is fine.  There is a issue with it running on windows 7 64bit, frequent freezes and audio glitches make it frusturating to play, mostly works fine but is annoying enough and frequent enoguht to cause issues.  


TLDR:  Buyer beware this is old softwarre and may not work well on new systems.

Sabe aquele jogo que te prende do começo até o fim? então esse jogo é sem duvida é Portal, com uma campanha rápida mais muito empolgante e divertida traz com ela um enredo cômico que te acompanha do começo ao fim da campanha, Portal sem duvida é um jogo que todo mundo deveria conhecer por proporcionar muita diversão e desafios empolgantes que vão fazer que você trabalhe bastante sua logica mais sem tira toda a diversão que o jogo proporciona

This is a relatively short game, no more than 6 hours on the first playthrough, back when the concept was still novel. What some of the other reviews fail to mention is that the amount of easter eggs in this game are INSANE. We're talking puzzles outside of the game itself, along the lines of notpron and Ready Player One (the book itself, not the story), minus the Delorean. Do yourself a favor and wiki it. Valve went as far as setting up a dialup BBS.

A must-play for any true gamer.
The cake is a lie!

Old but Gold. Can't say more about portal.

Puzzle Like Game, with FPS  elements.

Just Buy It!

I didn't know a game would give me migranes

Then I played Portal...

Wow. Just wow. Definitely worth while. I have never had a crash, glitch, or regret while playing this game. The world would just be a better place if everyone played Portal. If you don't own this game you are a disappointment to society.

BESTES! SPIEL! ALLER! ZEITEN!
Selbst Portal 2 kommt nicht an die einzigartige Athmosphäre und den dezenten, feinsinnigen Humor vom Original heran. Das Spielprinzip ist außerdem - im Gegensatz zum Nachfolger Portal 2 - herrlich klar und einfach, ohne weniger anspruchsvoll zu sein. Weiterhin führt das innovative Grundkonzept zu faszinierenden Perspektiven auf sich selbst und die Umgebung durch die Portale. Das Spiel ist relativ kurz, wirkt dadurch aber umso ausgereifter und runder.
Und dann dieser Abspann!! Diese Sausüßen Turrets!! MEIN BEGLEITERKUBUS!!! @-@

Besser geht nicht
of course
